summary: Come in out of the cold and enjoy a hot meal by the fire at your favorite inn. Adds more cooked foods, soups, meats & veggies to innkeepers.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Inns Actually Cook[/u][/b]

Adds cooked foods, soups, meats, veggies & desserts to innkeepersÂ so you can actually enjoy a hot meal.

Just a small little mod to make Skyrim a little cozier.

Requires Hearthfire. Also requires Wrye Bash - a bashed patch is required to see any in-game changes.




Verified, works with Skyrim Special Edition no problem.
author: dreamed1
